name: mobilization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of organizing or preparing something, such as a group of people, for a purpose: The area is notorious for low turnout, making voter mobilization crucial. The government pledged an all-out mobilization to get millions of stranded migrant workers home .
the act of preparing to fight, especially in a war: The mobilization of troops is to control the access along our border. The President appeared on national television and ordered the mobilization of reservists. See
mobilize
